README_0: rename this file to 'test_config.json' and set up the parameters to match your setup.
README_1: you can add as many PLCs as you want to the list. The program will cycle through them and test each one against all the tests.
README_2: The ListIdentify is used to identify the devices on the network.
Readme_3: The program will cycle through them and test each one against the list identity tests.
